## :construction:&nbsp;Overview

This repository contains my home [VyOS](https://docs.vyos.io/en/latest/index.html) configuration, and LTS iso release with custom package installed such as :

- [sops](https://github.com/getsops/sops)
- [git](https://git-scm.com/)
- [nano](https://www.nano-editor.org/)
- [jo](https://github.com/jpmens/jo)
- moreutils
- tree



## :handshake:&nbsp; Thanks

A lot of **stolen** :man_facepalming:&nbsp;code in this repository came from:

- [gabehoban](https://github.com/gabehoban/vyos-config)
- [budimanjojo](https://github.com/budimanjojo/vyos-config)
- [bjw-s](https://github.com/bjw-s/vyos-config)
- [scotte](https://github.com/szinn/vyos-config)
